featureType.name: prv_chamber
featureType.title: prv_chamber
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

virtualTable.name: prv_chamber
virtualTable.sql: SELECT a.chamber_id as "Chamber ID" , a.chamber_type as "Type of Chamber" , a.wss_id as "WSS ID" , b.wss_name as "WSS Name" , a.construction_year as "Construction Year" , a.rehabilitation_year as "Rehabilitation Year" , a.chamber_size as "Size of Chamber" , a.observation as "Observation" , a.input_date as "Inputted Date" , a.geom , a.elevation as "Elevation" , CASE WHEN a.is_breakpressure = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END as "for Breakpressure" , CASE WHEN a.chlorination_unit= 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END as "Installation of Chlorination Unit" , a.status FROM chamber a INNER JOIN wss b ON a.wss_id = b.wss_id WHERE a.chamber_type = 'PRV chamber'
